domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Financial Services Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to Banks, Credit cards, Insurance, Investments, Stocks

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

tweets.text: Working in local coffee shops in NYC honestly altered my brain chemistry because every time I see ‚Äúsupporting your local businesses‚Äù as a more ‚Äúethical‚Äù choice I have to laugh.
